benchmark_details.name: DORE
benchmark_details.overview: DORE is a dataset for Definition Modelling in Portuguese, comprising more than 100,000 definitions, filling the gap for DM datasets in mid/high-resource languages.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To fill the gap in available datasets for Definition Modelling for the Portuguese language and to facilitate research and applications in this area.

data.source: Data was collected from Dicio and Portuguese Wiktionary, both being publicly available resources.
data.annotation: Definitions were scraped from publicly available online dictionaries.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics were calculated based on the performance of the models on the test set.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better generation quality of definitions.
methodology.validation: The dataset was validated by splitting into training and test sets and experimenting with various models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial-ShareAlike (CC-BY-NC-SA) 4.0 International Public License
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Permission was sought from Dicio to use definitions for research.
